project(spng C)
add_library(spng_static STATIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libspng/spng/spng.c)
target_compile_definitions(spng_static PUBLIC SPNG_STATIC)
target_link_libraries(spng_static PUBLIC ZLIB::ZLIB)
target_include_directories(spng_static PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/libspng/spng/)
add_library(spng::spng ALIAS spng_static)
